name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Internxt VPN - Free, Encrypted & Unlimited VPN

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Internxt free VPN for Chrome: an encrypted, secure VPN built to protect your privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of being blocked by websites? Do you want to avoid the risks of Public Wi-Fi and keep your data protected while surfing the web?

This VPN extension for Chrome hides your IP address, encrypts your data, and keeps your browsing experience private, secure, and unrestricted. 

We also encrypt your internet connection to scramble your data, keeping you safe from network attacks and leaks. Encrypting your traffic with a private VPN also stops hackers from viewing sensitive information. 

Download for free and instantly start browsing in complete freedom and peace of mind, knowing that your privacy is protected.

Benefits of the VPN include:
- Free VPN: 100% free. No credit card details are required.
- Unlimited VPN: Truly unlimited. No session, speed, or bandwidth limitations.
- Simple: You will instantly connect to a new location once you click connect. 
- Secure VPN: Our military-grade AES-256 encryption allows you to browse anonymously and securely. 

What is a VPN Chrome extension?
This tool is the best method to ensure your privacy when browsing the internet. It encrypts your internet traffic directly within your Chrome browser, offering a convenient way to browse securely on public Wi-Fi or access geo-restricted content.

How the Internxt VPN protects you online
- Prevent targeted ads
This VPN significantly reduces the number of targeted ads you see. This makes it more difficult for advertisers to track your browsing habits and build a profile on you. Since advertisers can't target you as effectively, you'll see fewer ads based on your interests when you browse the web.

- Bypass annoying Geo-restrictions
Our private VPN scrambles your data, making it unreadable by websites. Since the website can't pinpoint your location, it can't enforce geo-restrictions based on your location. This allows you to access content that might be unavailable in your region.

- Protect your online privacy
We offer the best security and encryption at lightning-fast speeds. Our encryption protects your connection as it travels between your device and the internet. This is particularly important when using public Wi-Fi networks, where your data could be vulnerable to hackers.

- Strict no-logs policy
We do not save any user connection logs, meaning our free VPN doesn't record or store any data about your online activity. This includes information like the websites you visit, the files you download, or the apps you use. We keep this information completely private and anonymous. 

- Increased online privacy
Surf the web in complete privacy without anybody knowing where you’re connecting from. 

- Surf the Web Anonymously.
Avoid your ISP from monitoring your activity and prevent websites from ad tracking and targeting. Internxt’s private VPN hides your IP address, so your online identity is anonymous, and your internet activity is inaccessible to third parties.

- Quick, easy to use, and 100% free.

Download for free, connect, and start surfing securely. It’s that simple!  

How do I enable the VPN?
• Add the VPN browser extension to your browser
• Click the Internxt VPN icon in the top right of your browser
• Click the toggle button next to “VPN Protection” to activate 
• You're done! You can now securely and privately browse the internet!

About Internxt
Internxt is a secure cloud storage service that protects your privacy with our end-to-end encrypted products, Internxt Drive, Send, and more. 

This VPN is part of our mission to provide everyone with a more secure, private online experience. Download it for free to keep your data safe from hackers, data breaches, and tracking. 

Privacy Policy
Internxt values the privacy of our users. We protect your data with our free VPN and our other product suites; we do not store or collect your data. Our zero-knowledge encryption policy ensures that no hackers, businesses, or even Internxt can view your encrypted data.

We do not share data with third parties, and we do not include any ads in our services.
